item.description:
You are invited to bring a potluck dish using as many locally grown ingredients as possible from your garden, CSA, Farmer's Market, farm stand or local food artisan. Label your dish so we know what's in it and who to thank. Enjoy delicious homemade pizza from the earth oven!. The oven will be stoked for pizza, so bring fixin's and stuff to cook in the oven.

We are aiming for a zero-waste event, so please bring your own "mess kits" — non-disposal plate, cup, utensils and cloth napkin. Leftover vegetable waste can be composted in the New Eden compost bins.

Bring friends and family and musical instruments, as we want to have a musical jam and dance fest. Park on the street and we will block off the parking lot for kickball.

This program is co-sponsored by Transition Newburyport, the New Eden Collaborative and the First Parish Church of Newbury.
item.name: Local Flavor Community Potluck Picnic and Earth Oven Bake
